name: Devour The King
description:
Made in the 48 hour Kingston University 2022 Game Jam, where the theme was of "Corruption and Mutation". Devour the King has the player take on the role of a shapeshifting assassin who must knockout guards and disguise as them to break into the castle. The player can transform into them for a short period of time or devour them to disguise for a longer period of time. The player must be cautious not to devour too many guards otherwise they will succumb to corruption and die.

Controls:

Move: Left and right arrow

Jump: Up arrow 

Block/Parry: Left Shift

Attack: Spacebar

Transform: E

Devour: F

Interact: E

Game design and level design developed by Lara Katerina Pacudan

Assets used:

Player and Guards: Bandits - Pixel Art (by Sven Thole)

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/bandits-pixel-art-104130

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/medieval-pixel-art-asset-free-130131#description

Sounds: FREE Casual Game SFX Starter Pack (by Dustyroom)

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-54116

Music: 8-bit music free (by Cron Audio)

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/8-bit-music-free-136967#publisher
